name: McCree
description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, McCree takes out targets with deadeye precision and dives out of danger with eagle-like speed.

abilities.name: Peacekeeper
abilities.description: McCree fires off a round from his trusty six-shooter. He can fan the Peacekeeper’s hammer to swiftly unload the entire cylinder.

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.description: McCree dives in the direction he's moving, effortlessly reloading his Peacekeeper in the process.

abilities.name: Flashbang
abilities.description: McCree heaves a blinding grenade that explodes shortly after it leaves his hand. The blast staggers enemies in a small radius.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.description: Focus. Mark. Draw. McCree takes a few precious moments to aim; when he's ready to fire, he shoots every enemy in his line of sight. The weaker his targets are, the faster he'll line up a killshot.
